name: SMASH BASH: Date with the Desert
name_original: SMASH BASH: Date with the Desert
description:
Controls: W,A,S,D - movement, LMB - fire, R - reload, E - use, ESC - pause/exit.

Game in development stage. Bugs may appear. You can share your opinion here or in social networks.

Download demoversion: http://smash-bash.com/files/SMASH_BASH_-_Date_with_the_Desert_(demobuild).zip

Game website: http://smash-bash.com/

Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/smashbashgame/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/smashbashgame

VKontakte: https://vk.com/smash_bash
